title.rendered: Irfan Pathan Praises RRs Star Riyan Parag, Feels ‘He’ll Play For India In Next Two Years’

content.rendered:
After Riyan Parag’s knock for Rajasthan Royals against Delhi Capitals in the IPL 2024 match played at the SMS Stadium in Jaipur on Thursday (March 28), former All India player Irfan Pathan praised him and said and at 22 The 12-year-old star will play for India for the next two years.

On Thursday (March 28), in the IPL 2024 match played against Delhi Capitals in Jaipur, Riyan Parag blazed for Rajasthan Royals. The 22-year-old right-arm batsman led the scoring charts for the Sanju Samson-led side, crafting 84 runs off 45 balls. His performance proved crucial in RR’s victory against DC, marking a significant moment in Rishabh Pant’s 100th IPL match.

Impressed by Parag’s impressive performance at the SMS Stadium, former All India pacer Irfan Patan, who has now given the professional cap, gave him high praise and predicted that in the next two years, he will be playing for India.
Taking to X (formerly Twitter) after Parag guided RR to 185 for 5 in 20 overs against Delhi during Match No. 9 of IPL 2024, Pathan tweeted, “In the next two years Riyan Parag is playing for India…”

In another tweet, he emphasized the importance of playing domestic cricket and wrote, “Don’t take Indian domestic cricket for granted, it is for your own good. Look at Riyan Parag. He did well immediately in IPL because he made tons of runs there. “

Read Also: Full List of Records Broken During SRH vs MI in IPL 2024.
